mapper.select: select id, business_type, operation_objective_id, operation_objective_name, api_url, api_method, permission_code, permission_name, rank, is_delete, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, out_menu_id, out_menu_permission_id from yh_srm_usercenter_test.menu_permission where id = #{id}

select id, business_type, operation_objective_id, operation_objective_name, api_url, api_method, permission_code, permission_name, rank, is_delete, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, out_menu_id, out_menu_permission_id from yh_srm_usercenter_test.menu_permission limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into yh_srm_usercenter_test.menu_permission(business_type, operation_objective_id, operation_objective_name, api_url, api_method, permission_code, permission_name, rank, is_delete, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, out_menu_id, out_menu_permission_id) values (#{businessType}, #{operationObjectiveId}, #{operationObjectiveName}, #{apiUrl}, #{apiMethod}, #{permissionCode}, #{permissionName}, #{rank}, #{isDelete}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{outMenuId}, #{outMenuPermissionId})

insert into yh_srm_usercenter_test.menu_permission(business_type, operation_objective_id, operation_objective_name, api_url, api_method, permission_code, permission_name, rank, is_delete, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, out_menu_id, out_menu_permission_id) values
(#{entity.businessType}, #{entity.operationObjectiveId}, #{entity.operationObjectiveName}, #{entity.apiUrl}, #{entity.apiMethod}, #{entity.permissionCode}, #{entity.permissionName}, #{entity.rank}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updatedTime}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.outMenuId}, #{entity.outMenuPermissionId})

insert into yh_srm_usercenter_test.menu_permission(business_type, operation_objective_id, operation_objective_name, api_url, api_method, permission_code, permission_name, rank, is_delete, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, out_menu_id, out_menu_permission_id) values
(#{entity.businessType}, #{entity.operationObjectiveId}, #{entity.operationObjectiveName}, #{entity.apiUrl}, #{entity.apiMethod}, #{entity.permissionCode}, #{entity.permissionName}, #{entity.rank}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updatedTime}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.outMenuId}, #{entity.outMenuPermissionId})
on duplicate key update business_type = values(business_type) , operation_objective_id = values(operation_objective_id) , operation_objective_name = values(operation_objective_name) , api_url = values(api_url) , api_method = values(api_method) , permission_code = values(permission_code) , permission_name = values(permission_name) , rank = values(rank) , is_delete = values(is_delete) , created_time = values(created_time) , updated_time = values(updated_time) , created_by = values(created_by) , updated_by = values(updated_by) , out_menu_id = values(out_menu_id) , out_menu_permission_id = values(out_menu_permission_id)
mapper.update:
update yh_srm_usercenter_test.menu_permission
business_type = #{businessType},
operation_objective_id = #{operationObjectiveId},
operation_objective_name = #{operationObjectiveName},
api_url = #{apiUrl},
api_method = #{apiMethod},
permission_code = #{permissionCode},
permission_name = #{permissionName},
rank = #{rank},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
created_time = #{createdTime},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
created_by = #{createdBy},
updated_by = #{updatedBy},
out_menu_id = #{outMenuId},
out_menu_permission_id = #{outMenuPermissionId},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id from yh_srm_usercenter_test.menu_permission where is_delete = 0

select id, business_type, operation_objective_id, operation_objective_name, api_url, api_method, permission_code, permission_name, rank, is_delete, created_time, updated_time, created_by, updated_by, out_menu_id, out_menu_permission_id from yh_srm_usercenter_test.menu_permission where 1 = 1 and is_delete = 0 and id >= #{min} and id <= #{max}
